20110128010656.000|20110128010658.000|CC1|FARMVILLE, WHERE USERS OWN A

20110128010704.000|20110128010705.000|CC1|TO ORDER.

20110128010715.000|20110128010717.000|CC1|AND FINDS HIM FACE DOWN IN THE  
20110128010717.000|20110128010717.000|CC1|WATER.                          
20110128010717.000|20110128010719.000|CC1|>> EXPLAIN TO ME CAFE WORLD.    
20110128010719.000|20110128010721.000|CC1|>> IT'S A SIMULATED GAME WHERE  
20110128010721.000|20110128010724.000|CC1|PLAYERS OWN A RESTAURANT.       
20110128010724.000|20110128010725.000|CC1|AND WHAT THEY CAN DO, IS THEY   
20110128010725.000|20110128010726.000|CC1|CAN PICK CERTAIN DISHES THAT    
20110128010726.000|20110128010728.000|CC1|THEY WANT, CERTAIN SPICES TO    
20110128010728.000|20110128010729.000|CC1|CHANGE THE WAY THE RESTAURANT   
20110128010729.000|20110128010729.000|CC1|WORKS.                          
20110128010729.000|20110128010732.000|CC1|>> WHOA, STOP.

20110128010735.000|20110128010738.000|CC1|THE FOOD -- THE IMAGINARY FOOD? 
20110128010738.000|20110128010740.000|CC1|NO, YOU PICK THE IMAGINARY      
20110128010740.000|20110128010742.000|CC1|SPICES YOU'RE GOING TO PUT IN   
20110128010742.000|20110128010743.000|CC1|THE IMAGINARY FOOD?             
20110128010743.000|20110128010746.000|CC1|AND YOUR IMAGINARY CAFE?        
20110128010746.000|20110128010748.000|CC1|IS THAT WHAT YOU JUST SAID?     
20110128010748.000|20110128010750.000|CC1|AND WHO EATS -- WHAT IMAGINARY  
20110128010750.000|20110128010752.000|CC1|PEOPLE EAT THE IMAGINARY FOOD?  
20110128010752.000|20110128010753.000|CC1|>> THAT'S A GOOD QUESTION.      
20110128010753.000|20110128010755.000|CC1|IT'S BASED ON A POINT SYSTEM    
20110128010755.000|20110128010756.000|CC1|SIMILAR TO FARMVILLE.           
20110128010756.000|20110128010758.000|CC1|YOU GET POINTS ON HOW MANY      
20110128010758.000|20110128010801.000|CC1|PEOPLE COME TO VISIT.
